trans-unit.source: Only run the command peregrine_initial_site if you are running on a new project, as it loads database fixtures!
trans-unit.target: Only run the command peregrine_initial_site if you are running on a new project, as it loads database fixtures!

trans-unit.source: Are you looking for a more robust system, for example, creating a marketing site? The maintainer of Peregrine also contributes to CodeRedCMS, which offers a lot more bells and whistles. Peregrine will remain a basic blogging system.
trans-unit.target: Are you looking for a more robust system, for example, creating a marketing site? The maintainer of Peregrine also contributes to CodeRedCMS, which offers a lot more bells and whistles. Peregrine will remain a basic blogging system.

trans-unit.source: After you've set up your settings, we need to create your database and a superuser. Issue the following commands from your project root directory.
trans-unit.target: После того,как вы настроите свои параметры,нам нужно создать базу данных и суперпользователя.Выдайте следующие команды из корневого каталога вашего проекта.

trans-unit.source: Getting Started: the Five Minute Install

Peregrine is an opinionated blogging platform which uses the Wagtail CMS on the Django web framework. It uses Wagtail's fantastic StreamField feature to provide fully structured content body element blocks, completely separating content from the presentation layer (CSS, JS, and HTML).
trans-unit.target: Peregrine is an opinionated blogging platform which uses the Wagtail CMS on the Django web framework. It uses Wagtail's fantastic StreamField feature to provide fully structured content body element blocks, completely separating content from the presentation layer (CSS, JS, and HTML).

trans-unit.source: Peregrine is an opinioned blog system for the Wagtail content management system on the Django Web Framework.
trans-unit.target: Peregrine-это авторитетная блоговая система для системы управления контентом Wagtail на Django Web Framework.

trans-unit.source: Peregrine requires at least Wagtail 2.0 and Django 2.0.
trans-unit.target: Для сапсана требуется,по крайней мере,трясогузка 2.0 и Джанго 2.0.

trans-unit.source: These instructions will be fleshed out, but if you want to give it a try, here are the basics.
trans-unit.target: Эти инструкции будут дополнены,но если вы хотите попробовать,вот основы.

trans-unit.source: You should then be able to navigate to http://localhost:8000/cms/ and log in, and start creating!
trans-unit.target: You should then be able to navigate to http://localhost:8000/cms/ and log in, and start creating!

trans-unit.source: Your settings file will be located in my_blog/settings.py if you're using the default Django project layout created by the startproject command above. You'll need to add the sections beneath INSTALLED_APPS and MIDDLEWARE, and add 'wagtail.contrib.settings.context_processors.settings', to your TEMPLATES context processors in your settings to look like this.
trans-unit.target: Your settings file will be located in my_blog/settings.py if you're using the default Django project layout created by the startproject command above. You'll need to add the sections beneath INSTALLED_APPS and MIDDLEWARE , and add 'wagtail.contrib.settings.context_processors.settings', to your TEMPLATES context processors in your settings to look like this.
